ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Anisotropic_material is a type of
whose properties are different in each material direction.
A Braided_assembly is a type of .

ext_description.p:
A Discontinuous_fiber_assembly is a type of
that is a collection of discontinuous fibers suspended in a homogeneous material (matrix). In general, the length of the fibers are relatively the same within a detail. The orientation of the fibers is usually random.
ext_description.note: When a ply is made from a Discontinuous_fiber_assembly, the Discontinuous_fiber_assembly is in the form of a sheet or is applied as a constant thickness coating to the area defined by the ply.
Some resin transfer molded (RTM) parts, where the mixture of short fibers and matrix is injected into a mold, can be viewed as a Discontinuous_fiber_assembly.

ext_description.p:
A Filament_assembly is a type of
that is a collection of yarns or tows combined together in some manner and frequently embedded in a matrix of homogenous material. The Filament_assembly is usually measured by weight and sometimes length to describe the amount needed for a .
ext_description.note: When a ply is made from a Filament_assembly it is usually referred to as woven or non-woven fabric such as broad goods and tape. A ply can also be made from such things as a collection of tows or yarn provided the tow or yarn lay flat in the area described by the ply and they are a single thickness that does not stack on top of one another or overlap.

The thickness or cross-sectional area of a Filament_assembly is specified in the ply or
that is made from the stock material. These are usually specified in cured thickness or cross-sectional area.

ext_description.p:
A Isotropic_material is a type of
that is made up of a single uniform internal structure.
ext_description.note: When Isotropic_material such as resin plays the role of a matrix within other stock materials, the Isotropic_material is combined with filaments to make filament assemblies and with fibers to make discontinuous fiber assemblies.
When Isotropic_material such as stabilizers, foaming and film adhesives are applied separately from other stock materials, a ply references the Isotropic_material to provide placement and thickness.

When Isotropic_material are such things as blocks of material that can be described by a fixed shape, they can either be considered
or remain Isotropic_material if they are not going to be combined with other
to produce a composite part. The latter could take on the part types of extrusion, plate, bar, casting, forging, and tubing.
ext_description.example: Resins, stabilizers, foaming and film adhesives are types of Isotropic_material. Also metals in general can be considered Isotropic_material.

ext_description.p: A Material_direction is the identification of the principal direction of a material.
ext_description.note: A woven fabric will have both a warp and fill directions. The Material_direction shall identify the warp direction for orientation in the laminate. The Material_direction for a honeycomb core shall be that of the ribbon direction.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies the principal
within the material.

ext_description.p:
A Stock_core is a type of
that is processed to be placed within a laminate and play a role in enhancing the stiffness of the laminate.
ext_description.example: Honeycomb, phenolic block, and corrugation are types of Stock_core.

ext_description.p: A Stock_material is a type of . A Stock_material is the material typically procured from a material supplier to fabricate a .
ext_description.note: The Stock_material in this Part of 10303 is limited to the material types that physically become all or a portion of the finished part.
ext_description.p:
A Stock_material may be either a
or a , or a , or a , or a , or a , or a .

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies the
that defines the behavior of the Stock_material to an external response.

specifies the
of interest for the Stock_material such as cell direction, grain direction, etc. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies the role of the
for the Stock_material.
A Woven_assembly is a type of .
